channel.title: Teleporting
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a Devolution 7.0 server source and i would like to know the setting for making you teleport randomly in any place in a certain area. Eg. Instead of teleporting directly to varrock it would be so it will randomly teleport you anywhere in the permimeter of varrock.
All help is appreciated.
Thanx! :)

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

teleX = Xcoord of southwest corner of varrock + misc.random(#of spaces on the X plane that varrock is);
teleY = Ycoord of southwest corner of varrock + misc.random(#of spaces on the y plane that varrock is);

Read full topic
